=== About Me ===

I'm Evan! Hi.

I'm lead developer of <nowiki>[[http://adiumx.com|Adium]]</nowiki>, a developer for <nowiki>[[http://growl.info|Growl]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://pidgin.im|Pidgin]]</nowiki>, and various smaller projects.

I'm also co-owner of <nowiki>[[http://saltatory.com|Saltatory Software]]</nowiki>.

In the real world, I'm a 4th year medical student at Emory University in Atlanta, GA. I plan to be an ophthalmologist when I grow up.

See also: <nowiki>[[http://trac.adiumx.com/wiki/evands|AdiumTrac:evands]]</nowiki>.
